GTG everyone, C ya tomorrow.

::Zardus/DevilDuer/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

DevilDuer glances over at the scanner again, seeing there was yet another 
battle at the Pred cave.

"Zardus," he says into his comm-link, "Maximals are attacking the Pred base. 
Want us to make an entrance?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus reaches the exit of the Alliance base, recieving DevilDuer's 
transmission. He sighs, activating his comm-link again.

"Panzertron, there's been a change of plans, our meeting will be delayed," he 
says into it, closing the link.

He looks at Reptilica, and then at the new recruits. "There's a battle at the 
Predacon cave. We're gonna bust the party. Everyone ready?"

He activates his comm-link, sending a transmission to all Alliance troops: 
"We're going for a battle in a few minutes. Anyone that want to join, meet me 
at the entrance. Treadshot, Gotron, you should come on this mission, I think."
